gjs-html:
Your Cart is waiting for you!

Hey {{billing_address.first_name}},

We noticed that there were some items left in your shopping cart. We've saved your cart for you. Complete your order now!
Complete your purchase

Item

Description

Cost

{% for line in line_items %}{% capture product_attributes %}{% for p in line.properties %}{% unless p.last==blank or p.first contains '_options' %}
{{p.first}}:{{p.last}}{% endunless %}{% endfor %}{% endcapture %}
{{line.title}} x {{line.quantity}} {{product_attributes}} {{line.line_price | money}}
{% endfor %}

Your discount coupon

As a way of saying thanks for shopping with us, here is a discount code for 10% off your next purchase within the next two weeks.

SHOP NOW!

@ {{shop.name}} | {{shop.address}}

If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out to us.

If you don't want to receive any future emails  unsubscribe here

gjs-css: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body {margin: 0;}#i8n9{name:Lato;href:https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato:400,700;id:i8n9;}#ivrh{name:Oswald;href:https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Oswald:500,600,700;id:ivrh;}#iamxbo{background-color:#FFFFFF;border-radius:4px 4px 0px 0px;id:iamxbo;}#ip043{src:https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/retainful/emailCustomizer@0.1.9/images/your-logo.png;id:ip043;width:100%;}#ii1oeh{background-color:#FFFFFF;id:ii1oeh;padding-bottom:20px;padding-top:20px;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;background-url:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/retainful/emailCustomizer/master/images/gradient-min.png;}#inmyd{width:100%;id:inmyd;}#ip8trd{color:#ffffff;font-size:32px;font-weight:600;font-family:Lato, Helvetica, sans-serif;line-height:1em;align:center;id:ip8trd;padding-bottom:0;}#iffppv{color:#fff;font-size:20px;font-weight:500;line-height:1.7;font-family:Lato, Helvetica, sans-serif;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0px;id:iffppv;}#if2q9a{background-color:#2ccf9c;href:{{abandoned_checkout_url}};font-family:Lato, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-weight:700;font-size:18px;border-radius:4px 4px 4px 4px;padding-right:40px;padding-left:40px;padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px;color:#fff;id:if2q9a;height:50px;}#itl3p{background-color:#fff;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;id:itl3p;}#iooa4{background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;id:iooa4;}#i4z9a-2{background-color:#fff;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-bottom:1px solid #e5e5e5;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0;css-class:hidden-xs;id:i4z9a-2;}#iydty-2{padding-top:0%;padding-bottom:2%;id:iydty-2;}#iesaj-2{padding-top:0%;padding-bottom:2%;align:center;id:iesaj-2;}#ixvdg-2{padding-top:0%;padding-bottom:2%;align:center;id:ixvdg-2;}#iooa4-2{background-color:#FFFFFF;padding-bottom:0;padding-top:0;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;id:iooa4-2;}#itxvz-2{width:100%;id:itxvz-2;}#i3xn2-2{cr-editable:false;padding-top:0;padding-right:0;padding-bottom:0;padding-left:0;id:i3xn2-2;}#injxk{background-color:#fff;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;padding-top:0;id:injxk;}#iq8f{padding-top:0;background-color:#fff;id:iq8f;border-right:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:1px solid #e5e5e5;padding-bottom:10px;}#iof5{font-weight:400;font-size:28px;align:center;font-family:Lato,Helvetica,sans-serif;id:iof5;}#i7lpl{cr-editable:false;coupon-block:true;text-decoration:underline;color:#6171e1;font-weight:bold;font-size:20px;font-family:Lato, Helvetica, sans-serif;line-height:1.8em;align:center;padding-top:10;padding-bottom:10;id:i7lpl;}#ijjd{container-background-color:#ffffff;background-color:#6171e1;data-cr-id:rtl_shop_now;href:{{abandoned_checkout_url_with_coupon_code}};padding-top:20px;font-family:Lato, #e5e5e5;id:iy6ykf;}#ikfoz{background-color:#000000;}#iceob{id:iceob;font-size:12px;border-radius:12px;color:#535353;}#inpa6{name:facebook-noshare;content: ;id:inpa6;}#ikpki{name:twitter-noshare;content: ;id:ikpki;}#i8bik{padding-top:0%;padding-bottom:0%;align:center;color:#ffffff;}#outlook a{padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;}.ExternalClass
